mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product ( trade_id, brand_id, `name`, `order`, title, keyword, subscription, logo_url, logo_real_url, content ) VALUES ( #{tradeId}, #{brandId}, #{name}, #{order}, #{title}, #{keyword}, #{subscription}, #{logoUrl}, #{logoRealUrl}, #{content} )
mapper.select: SELECT p.id 'id', t.`name` 'tradeName', b.`name` 'brandName', p.`name` 'name', p.`order` 'order' FROM product p LEFT JOIN brand b ON p.brand_id = b.id LEFT JOIN trade t ON b.trade_id = t.id LIMIT #{start}, #{limit}

SELECT id 'id', brand_id 'brandId', `name` 'name', `order` 'order', title 'title', keyword 'keyword', subscription 'subscription', logo_url 'logoUrl', logo_real_url 'logoRealUrl', content 'content' FROM product WHERE id = #{id}
